column4: I am trying to install lamp server using tasksel but its showing a dialog box and then it stops. I just 2 days old in ubuntu
is the ubuntu install fully updated?
Yes
the release is irrelevant, if you run:  sudo apt-get update; sydi apt-get upgrade    are you fuly updated
Yes i updated yesterday
ok, run the taskel command and pastebin the output please
tasksel:aptitude failed(100)
you'll need to use sudo to copy the file
sudo cp file.php /var/www
I have done that now showing like this rajiv@rajiv:~$ sudo cp file.php /var/www cp: cannot stat `file.php': No such file or directory
well, is the file you want to copy in /home/rajiv ?
dont much about that somebody told me to run that command and i searcched that file but idint find it in that folder
then that's why. Where is the file located?
Actually my problem is that i am a web developer and i want create a php page and run it using lamp server but i am not able to save my page in /var/www then only i can run it
I am not sure about the insatallation  about the packege. I have done it through tasksel please direct me some other way to check its right  or not
I have found out the file File.php /usr/share/geany/templates/files
but its showing a locked sysmbol
sudo cp /usr/share/geany/templates/files/File.php /var/www
bluefish is one example
In blue fish we have to write each and every code & for desiging also i have to write code
or http://www.webupd8.org/2011/01/bluegriffon-new-wysiwyg-editor-which.html
